full_description:
Huawei FreeLace Pro Bluetooth Wireless Earphone

Huawei FreeLace Pro Bluetooth Wireless Earphone featured Dual-mic Active Noise Cancellation, 3 Noise Cancellation Modes, Awareness Mode, 24 Hour Battery Life. With the 3 Noise Cancellation Modes, You can find your Optimal Noise Cancellation, These modes are - Ultra Mood, Cozy Mode, and General Mode. This Earphone comes with Dual-mic Active Noise Cancellation So that Two highly sensitive microphones work together to achieve noise cancellation in and out. The large dynamic drivers generate stronger and deeper anti-noise sound, creating a pure, immersive world filled with sound. With the Awareness Mode, you can Stay Tuned with the Outside World, with things around you sounding and feeling natural. This earphone feature with 14 mm Powerful Dynamic Driver, It works with an independent low-frequency sound tube to achieve resonance effect, delivering punchier, deeper bass. The delicate diaphragm significantly improves the response capability for clear midrange and melodious treble, true to your ears and heart. With HUAWEI HiPair Technology and USB-C plug, HUAWEI FreeLace Pro can be paired with a phone, or a tablet in just one step. This also supports up to 24-hour playback. This new Huawei FreeLace Pro comes with 6 Month Replacement Warranty.

The new Huawei Free Lace Bluetooth Earphone built-in Hall magnetic sensor can detect whether the headphones are in use. You can attach to end the connection for longer battery life. This Earphone comes with 9.2mm moving coil unit Headphone, Bluetooth version 5.0, Waterproof rating IP55. This Earphone will provide Fast charge, charge for 5 minutes, play for 4 hours, Total playing time 18 hours and Total standby 12 days. This earphone is come with Call noise reduction, smart magnetic attraction Sensitivity 98dB, Battery capacity 120mAh, Frequency response range 20 - 20 KHz with Headphone cable length 788mm. In this earphone, the perfect collaboration between the Dual-channel Wind Noise Reduction and Bluetooth noise cancelling algorithm that saves your conversations from the hustle and bustle of your surroundings. These Huawei earphones have a waterproof design. No matter if you are in sweat or rain, the all-around protection allows you to carry on with your day. The IPX5-rated is based on test conditions and the enclosure is protected against water coming from any direction.
